feast.sdk.resources.feature_group.FeatureGroup¶

class feast.sdk.resources.feature_group.FeatureGroup(id, tags=[])[source]¶

Wrapper class for feast feature group

__init__(id, tags=[])[source]¶

Create FeatureGroup instance.

Parameters:
  • id (str) – id of feature group
  • tags (list) – Defaults to []. tags assigned to feature group as well as all children features.

Methods

__init__(id[, tags]) Create FeatureGroup instance.
dump(path) Dump the feature group into a yaml file.
from_yaml(path) Create an instance of feature group from a yaml spec file

spec

dump(path)[source]¶
Dump the feature group into a yaml file.
It will replace content of an existing file.
Parameters:path (str) – destination file path
